text: @RealJamesWoods Because it’s like a cold, in average an adult gets a cold 3-4 times a year,children 7-8. #Coronavirus is one of the primary viruses known to cause the common cold.And before the #PanicMafia comes to push fear, the common cold can cause your lungs to fill with fluid aka pneumonia
